item.description:

item.title: Dead fox, 31st August
item.description:
There is a dead fox in the alley behind our house, located behind number 65 and 66 Albany road. Access to the alleyway is from the back of our garden and Townshend Road. It doesn't smell good and is a concern for both our pets and our children in terms of disease risk.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albany Road, Chislehurst, London

item.title: No recycling bins, 31st August
item.description:
There are no recycling bins at Unit 1/Unit 2 TIMBERWHARF ROAD, RAVENSDALE IND.ESTATE. N16 6AY This leads to all tenants to mix their recycling inappropriately going against the environmental regulatory requirements.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Leadale Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Flytipping on Hawking Walk/Robin Way, 31st August
item.description:
The flytipping problem on these roads (Hawking walk & Robin Way) are constant and need to be dealt with. Everyday these get worse and worse. Currently over the past few weeks, we have seen an increase in these. Broken bikes are left on the shared green space, a whole bed is left against the wall at the corner of Robin Way, as well as excessive England spray paint, and finally the litter problem needs to be dealt with. Please can this be removed of, thank you. Please could this

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4-7, Hawkinge Walk, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
